## Description
The National Security and Intelligence Review Agency (NSIRA) is issuing a Request for Proposal (RFP) for a Communications Consultant - Senior under its ProServices E60ZT-180024 Supply Arrangement (SA).

The SA is categorised under **Project Management Services** (Stream 10) and has two eligible SA Holders, namely **Syntax Strategic** and **The Right Door Consulting & Solutions**.

## Description of Requirement
The Agency requires a Communications Consultant - Senior to provide expertise in preparing and implementing a communications strategy for the release of a parliamentary report. The successful contractor will also be responsible for delivering internal media and communications training.

## Evaluation Criteria
The proposal will be evaluated based on **Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price**, with the highest combined score determining the success.

**Notice of No Restriction in Tendering**
There is no restriction on participating in this tendering process. Suppliers who are unaware of the SA requirement may register and obtain the solicitation document on [Multiple Current Tender webpage](https://buyandsell.gc.ca/procurement-data/tenders?utilities%5Border%5D=bieType_schedreceipt&utilities%5BOperand%5D=wieScheduleReceiptManagementREG&file_format=multiple_current).
